org.beanfabrics.swing
Class BnTextArea

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
                  javax.swing.JTextArea
                      org.beanfabrics.swing.internal.TextPMTextArea
                          org.beanfabrics.swing.BnTextArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, ModelSubscriber, View<ITextPM>
public class BnTextArea
extends TextPMTextArea
implements ModelSubscriber

The BnTextArea is a JTextArea that can subscribe to an ITextPM.

For an example about using BnTextArea, please see http://www.beanfabrics.org/index.php/BnTextArea

Author:
Michael Karneim
See Also:
Serialized Form
